alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 14 at 1:21PM CST until November 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, significant coastal flooding. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Lower St. Bernard and Eastern Orleans Parishes. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Warning, until 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
